Rattrap observes the happenings, and ponders them.=A0 He could see some sor=
t of pattern happening.
=A0
"Hmmm, whatever it is, it's feedn' off of aggre=
ssion and anger.=A0 The Cons and Preds got plenty of that.=A0 Notice how it=
 didn't take any of us yet?=A0 It's like I dunno, but it's like it knows ho=
w we operate and what makes us tick.=A0 I could be wrong, but that's what i=
t feels like.."
=A0
Quickstride nods.
=A0
" You're right, it hasn't taken a=
ny of us Maximals yet.=A0 It's like it knows something.=A0 Chaos..=A0 It co=
uld be feeding off of chaos, and that's one thing we don't have here.=A0 Am=
ong us anyway.=A0 Guys, I think Rattrap's onto something, if we keep our co=
mposure as we are, and our commitment to cooperation, whatever grabbed them=
 won't grab us.=A0"
=A0
Rattrap looks to everyone.
=A0
" We gotta keep our =
cool, even if=A0 it is gonna be difficult.."
=A0
He looks over to Skyshadow=
 and Cryotek.
=A0
" If you guys wanna avoid what happened ta your boss, ya =
better keep it tagether.=A0 Just a little hint of advice."
